```{r commcatch}
catch <- read.csv(here::here(year,'safe','static_tables','catch_abc_tac_ofl_mgmt.csv'))
# catch[,2:4] <- round(catch[,2:4],0)
catch$Year<-as.character(catch$Year)
flextable::regulartable(catch) %>%
  flextable::set_caption("Total catch, ABC, Final TAC, OFL, and associated management measures for BSAI FHS since 2007. The Total column are the catches used in the assessment and projection model. Catch at age and length are provided in separate tables. Catch Accounting System via AKFIN database.")%>%
  flextable::font(fontname = "Times New Roman", part = "all") %>%
  flextable::fontsize(size = 11, part = "all")
```

```{r fishlengthcompst} 
flextable::regulartable(mod18.2c_2024$lendbase %>%
  filter(Fleet ==1 & sex == 1 & !(Yr %in% unique(mod18.2c_2024$ghostlendbase$Yr[mod18.2c_2024$ghostlendbase$Fleet==1]))) %>%
    mutate(n_h = mean(effN), .by = 'Year')
                          select(Yr, effN,Bin, Obs ) %>% 
                          reshape2::melt(id = c('Yr', 'effN')) %>%
                          dplyr::mutate('Length (cm)' = as.numeric(variable) ) %>%
                          # select(year,n_h,length) %>%
                          tidyr::pivot_wider(
                            id_cols = 'Length (cm)',
                            names_from = c(Yr,effN),
                            names_glue = "{Yr} ({effN})",
                            values_from = value) %>%
  flextable::set_caption("Fishery length frequency data for POP in the GOA for the most recent 10 complete years used in the model. Input sample sizes (square root of nominal sample size scaled with a maximum of 100) are in parentheses.") %>%
  flextable::colformat_double(j = 2:11,digits = 3) %>%
  flextable::compose(i = 30, j = 1, flextable::as_paragraph('45+')) %>%
  flextable::font(fontname = "Times New Roman", part = "all") %>%
  flextable::fontsize(size = 11, part = "all")

```
